Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3

Class POP3ServerMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.POP3ServerMetrics
  • public class POP3ServerMetrics
extends java.lang.Object
    OpenTelemetry metrics for POP3 servers.

    This class provides standardized POP3 server metrics for monitoring mail retrieval operations.

    Metrics provided:

    • pop3.server.connections - Total number of POP3 connections
    • pop3.server.active_connections - Number of active connections
    • pop3.server.session.duration - Session duration in milliseconds
    • pop3.server.authentications - Authentication attempts
    • pop3.server.messages.retrieved - Messages retrieved by clients
    • pop3.server.messages.deleted - Messages marked for deletion
    • pop3.server.bytes.transferred - Bytes transferred to clients
    Author:
    Chris Burdess
